programme.desc: Tired of bad luck, Fiona takes her mother on a trip to Ireland to turn things around. She soon meets a charming single father who helps her make her own luck.

programme.desc: Lily travels to Scotland with her mom and reconnects with Logan, a childhood family friend. Unbeknownst to Lily and Logan, their meddling mothers hatch a plan to play matchmaker.

programme.desc: Refusing to leave a newly listed home, a ghost becomes convinced she cannot pass over until she gets a woman back together with her ex.

programme.desc: Corporate exec Megan starts a board of directors to improve her younger sister's chaotic life and finds romance with a psych professor who uncovers her tough demeanor.
